settings.name: John Doe
settings.title: Full Stack Developer
settings.summary: I build accessible, pixel-perfect, performant, and web experiences. Passionate about creating software that solves real-world problems and delights users.

items.description: Lead development of scalable web applications using React and Node.js. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions. Mentored junior developers and implemented best practices for code quality.

Built responsive user interfaces using React and TypeScript. Worked closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect designs. Optimized application performance and improved user experience metrics by 40%.

items.title: E-Commerce Platform
items.description: Built a full-featured e-commerce platform with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. Includes user authentication, payment processing, and admin dashboard with real-time analytics.

items.title: Task Management App
items.description: Developed a collaborative task management application with real-time updates using Socket.io. Features include team collaboration, file sharing, and progress tracking.

items.title: Weather Dashboard
items.description: Created a responsive weather dashboard that displays current conditions and forecasts. Integrated with multiple weather APIs and includes location-based services.

items.title: Portfolio Website
items.description: Designed and developed a modern portfolio website with smooth animations and responsive design. Built with React and deployed on Vercel with continuous integration.

items.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

items.title: AWS Certified Developer
items.description: Achieved AWS Developer Associate certification demonstrating expertise in developing and maintaining applications on AWS.

items.title: Tech Innovation Award
items.description: Received company-wide recognition for developing an innovative solution that improved system performance by 60%.

items.title: Open Source Contributor
items.description: Active contributor to popular open source projects with 500+ GitHub stars and multiple merged pull requests.

items.title: Hackathon Winner
items.description: Won first place at the Bay Area Tech Hackathon for developing a sustainability-focused mobile application.
